system.description: The system that is the target of the link (e.g. http://example.com)

version.description: The version of the system that is the target of the link (e.g. 1)

code.description: The code for the link (e.g. http://loinc.org/fhir/la/2.1)

display.description: The display for the code (e.g. LOINC 2.1 RELMA Accession ID)

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user
